languages.text: "Имя ей — Эсхатос. Секрет таинства убиения машинного духа. Технология, воплощающая Прерывание Цикла. Должно ли было существовать ей? Или же она была воплощенной хулой на Омниссию и его творения?"

"Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology embodying the Discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of profanity against the Omnissiah and His creation?"
languages.original_text: "Имя ей — Эсхатос. Секрет таинства убиения машинного духа. Технология, воплощающая Прерывание Цикла. Должно ли было существовать ей? Или же она была воплощенной хулой на Омниссию и его творения?"

traits.locale_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology that embodied the discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of blasphemy against the Omnissiah and His creation?"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology that embodied the discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of blasphemy against the Omnissiah and His creation?"

traits.locale_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology embodying the discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of profanity against the Omnissiah and His creation?"

traits.locale_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology embodying the discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of profanity against the Omnissiah and His creation?"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「その名はエスカト。機械精霊を死に至らしめる儀式の秘密。円環の停止を具体的に為す技術。それは存在して当然だろうか？それとも万機神と彼の創造物に対する冒涜の極みだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology embodying the Discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of profanity against the Omnissiah and His creation?"

traits.locale_text: 「その名はエスカト。機械精霊を死に至らしめる儀式の秘密。円環の停止を具体的に為す技術。それは存在して当然だろうか？それとも万機神と彼の創造物に対する冒涜の極みだろうか？」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “困境的名字叫做‘终焉审判’，是一种可以杀死机魂的秘密仪式。这项技术本身就是‘终止循环’这一概念的具现化。但它应该存在吗？它的存在是否是对欧姆尼塞亚与祂造物的终极亵渎？”
languages.original_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology embodying the Discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of profanity against the Omnissiah and His creation?"

traits.locale_text: “困境的名字叫做‘终焉审判’，是一种可以杀死机魂的秘密仪式。这项技术本身就是‘终止循环’这一概念的具现化。但它应该存在吗？它的存在是否是对欧姆尼塞亚与祂造物的终极亵渎？”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Eschatos. Le secret du rite d'exécution d'un esprit de la machine. Une technologie incarnant l'Interruption du Cycle. Devait-elle exister ? Ou s'agissait-il de l'acte de défiance ultime envers l'Omnimessie et Sa création ? »
languages.original_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology embodying the Discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of profanity against the Omnissiah and His creation?"

traits.locale_text: « Eschatos. Le secret du rite d'exécution d'un esprit de la machine. Une technologie incarnant l'interruption du Cycle. Devait-elle exister ? Ou s'agissait-il de l'acte de défiance ultime envers l'Omnimessie et Sa création ? »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Su nombre fue Eschatos. El secreto del rito de acabar por completo con un espíritu máquina. La tecnología que dio lugar a la interrupción del Ciclo. ¿Estaba destinada a existir? ¿O era la cúspide de la profanación contra el Omnissiah y su creación?».
languages.original_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology embodying the Discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of profanity against the Omnissiah and His creation?"

traits.locale_text: «Su nombre fue Eschatos. El secreto del rito de acabar por completo con un espíritu máquina. La tecnología que dio lugar a la interrupción del Ciclo. ¿Estaba destinada a existir? ¿O era la cúspide de la profanación contra el Omnissiah y su creación?».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Er hieß Eschatos. Das Geheimnis des Ritus, wie man einen Maschinengeist tötet. Eine Technologie, welche die Verkörperung der Unterbrechung des Zyklus darstellt. War sie dazu bestimmt, zu existieren? Oder war sie der Höhepunkt der Blasphemie gegen den Omnissiah und seine Schöpfung?"
languages.original_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology embodying the Discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of profanity against the Omnissiah and His creation?"

traits.locale_text: "Er hieß Eschatos. Das Geheimnis des Ritus, wie man einen Maschinengeist tötet. Eine Technologie, welche die Verkörperung der Unterbrechung des Zyklus darstellt. War sie dazu bestimmt, zu existieren? Oder war sie der Höhepunkt der Blasphemie gegen den Omnissiah und seine Schöpfung?"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Buna Eskatos denir. Bir makine ruhunu öldürmek için kullanılan ayinin sırrı. Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu'nun vücut bulduğu bir teknoloji. Var olması gerekli miydi? Yoksa Hermesih'e ve O'nun yarattıklarına yönelik bir meydan okuma mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "Its name was Eschatos. The secret to the rite of putting a machine spirit to death. A technology embodying the Discontinuing of the Cycle. Was it meant to exist? Or was it the acme of profanity against the Omnissiah and His creation?"

traits.locale_text: "İsmi Eschatos idi. Bir makine ruhunu öldürmek için kullanılan ayinin sırrı. Döngü'nün süreğini bozmanın vücut bulduğu bir teknoloji. Var olması mı gerekiyordu? Yoksa Hermesih'e ve O'nun yaratımlarına edilen küfrün zirve noktası mıydı?"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "İsmi Eschatos idi. Bir makine ruhunu öldürmek için kullanılan ayinin sırrı. Döngü'nün süreğini bozmanın vücut bulduğu bir teknoloji. Var olması mı gerekiyordu? Yoksa Hermesih'e ve O'nun yaratımlarına edilen küfrün zirve noktası mıydı?"
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
